ProjectTitle: Multicenter randomized controlled clinical trial comparing ebastine and mebeverine as treatment of irritable bowel syndrome
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/04/2023
You now submitted the RDM questions from your application, at this stage of your project FWO expects a more detailed DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template. You can find the template in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website where you can also find more information about the FWO RDM requirements: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/
